profile.name: Ansul Agrawal
profile.aboutMe: Results-driven Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience building scalable full-stack applications and leading cross-functional development teams. Proven track record of optimizing system performance, reducing load times by up to 40%, and delivering enterprise-grade solutions serving thousands of users. Strong expertise in React, Node.js, cloud infrastructure, CI/CD automation, and modern DevOps practices.

experience.description: Architecting an OTA update system for robotic fleets using FastAPI and Python. Implemented secure authentication and RBAC with Keycloak. Built React dashboards for rollout management and telemetry monitoring with Grafana. Established CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Azure. Led SharePoint portal development and automated enterprise workflows using Power Automate and Microsoft Intune, reducing manual effort by up to 80%.

Led full-stack development for enterprise drone fleet management platforms serving 1000+ users. Built 50+ React pages with Redux Toolkit and Ant Design, reducing load times by 40%. Developed 50+ REST APIs using Node.js, Hapi.js, and MySQL. Led teams of up to 6 engineers, reduced production bugs by 35%, and cut deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes using CI/CD pipelines.

education.course: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

certificate.school: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology

project.name: React Big Schedule
project.description: Open-source React scheduling library with 175+ stars, 45+ forks, and 2000+ weekly npm downloads. Actively maintained with community contributions.
